DOC.brief_title: V930 First Man ( FIM ) Study ( V930-002 ) ( COMPLETED )
DOC.criteria: Patients must stag II , III , IV breast , colorectal , ovaria , nonsmall cell lung cancer Patients either disease free follow primary therapy advance disease durable response ( > 3 month ) standard therapy Tumor antigen HER2 and/or CEA must measurable blood detect Immunohistochemistry stain biopsy obtain primary tumor metastasis Patients prior treatment HER2 and/or CEA contain vaccine Patients significant cardiac disease Patients autoimmune disorder Patients pregnant lactating
